channel.title: [PI] Unnoting Rocktails
channel.description: So when I withdraw rocktails (15273) from my bank they don't unnote, meaning they don't turn into the unnoted form of them (15272) how would I go about fixing this? I already made them stackable. I just don't know how to unnote them. Thanks a lot!

item.title: [PI] Unnoting Rocktails
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Vhenom, post:7, topic:523882”]I tried doing that but it gave me errors. Weird. So I just decided to hard code it in item.java itemIsNote[15273] = true;
that’s for anyone in the future who may need that.[/quote]
I actually may need it in the future so thanks ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Unnoting Rocktails
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

I tried doing that but it gave me errors. Weird. So I just decided to hard code it in item.java itemIsNote[15273] = true;
that’s for anyone in the future who may need that.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Unnoting Rocktails
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Try getting a new notes.dat
It goes in your data folder (server sided)

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Unnoting Rocktails
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

sk8rdude461:

That is exactly what I said. The issue is your server can’t convert the noted items correctly. Because they were spawned noted.

Oh sorry, that was a hard post to understand. But how would I go about fixing this? Since it’s not like all my items do this, it’s just rocktails.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Unnoting Rocktails
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

That is exactly what I said. The issue is your server can’t convert the noted items correctly. Because they were spawned noted.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Unnoting Rocktails
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:523882”][quote author=Vhenom link=topic=642426.msg4326137#msg4326137 date=1372956590]
So when I withdraw rocktails (15273) from my bank they don’t unnote, meaning they don’t turn into the unnoted form of them (15272) how would I go about fixing this? I already made them stackable. I just don’t know how to unnote them. Thanks a lot!
[/quote]
Try spawning the un-noted ones.

The issue behind most servers, when spawning a noted item, is that the server doesn’t see it’s noted. So when you try to un-note it, it doesn’t change anything. I don’t exactly know how to explain it.
Here’s an ex:
Un-noted item > noted item > back to un-noted. [Normal Server]
Noted item > ??? > noted item [your issue]
It never actually hits the un note because it was spawned noted.[/quote]
When I spawn the unnoted ones they work perfectly, it’s just the notes that don’t convert to unnoted from banking.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Unnoting Rocktails
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Vhenom:

So when I withdraw rocktails (15273) from my bank they don’t unnote, meaning they don’t turn into the unnoted form of them (15272) how would I go about fixing this? I already made them stackable. I just don’t know how to unnote them. Thanks a lot!

Try spawning the un-noted ones.

The issue behind most servers, when spawning a noted item, is that the server doesn’t see it’s noted. So when you try to un-note it, it doesn’t change anything. I don’t exactly know how to explain it.
Here’s an ex:
Un-noted item > noted item > back to un-noted. [Normal Server]
Noted item > ??? > noted item [your issue]
It never actually hits the un note because it was spawned noted.

Read full topic
